Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

London Sketchbook, KV 15a–15ss

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

All Köchel catalogue entries used here are from the third and sixth versions of the catalogue. The collection is not included in the first version; in the second version, nine of the pieces are included under Anh. 109b.

KV2KV3,6piece
Anh. 109b/115a1. Piece in F major
Anh. 109b/215b2. Piece in C major
Anh. 109b/315p15. Piece in G minor
Anh. 109b/415m12. Piece in F major
Anh. 109b/515t19. Piece in F major
Anh. 109b/615x23. Piece in F major
Anh. 109b/715r17. Piece in G minor
Anh. 109b/815ff31. Piece in A-flat major
Anh. 109b/915ll36. Piece in B-flat major

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IX/27/1 · BA 4583-01 · Klavierstücke / Band 1: Die Notenbücher · ed. Wolfgang Plath
  • Associated Board: · 25 Early Pieces · ed. Howard Ferguson [nos. 1–5, 12, 14, 31, 33–34, 36–37 and 39–40]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 9177 · Die Notenbücher der Geschwister Mozart · ed. Wolfgang Plath
  • Henle · HN 22 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Henle · HN 23 · Klavierstücke · ed. Ullrich Scheideler
  • Könemann · K 113 · Klavierstücke · ed. István Máriássy [nos. 1–37 and 39–41]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50230 · Klavierstücke / Band 2: Spätere Werke · ed. Ulrich Leisinger [nos. 1–42, with completion of no. 42 by Robert Levin]
